link.label: Eclipse-Games
link.text: Learn how to enjoy Eclipse platform from a different point of view.

group.text:
Welcome to Eclipse-Games!

The goal of this feature is to provide several games as plugins for Eclipse platform.
Those plugins are well integrated in the IDE environment and provide amusement to the development community.

Currently, these are the games included:

link.label: Minesweeper
link.text: The objective of Minesweeper is to locate all the mines as quickly as possible without uncovering any of them. If you uncover a mine, you lose the game.

link.label: Minesweeper 2
link.text: The objective of Minesweeper II is to cross the mines field as quickly as possible without uncovering any of them. If you uncover a mine, you lose the game.

link.label: Snake
link.text: The objective of Snake is eat, eat and eat. And convert the worm into a big python. But be carefull, you can't touch mines, walls or the snake itself.

link.label: Sokoban
link.text: You are the warehouse keeper and you have to push the boxes to their correct positions in the warehouse.
